sentences.en: After many years of study, experts were eventually able to translate all the hieroglyphic symbols.
sentences.cn: 经过多年的研究, 专家们最后终于能够翻译所有的象形符号了.

sentences.en: An ancient mayan city of southern mexico southeast of villahermosa. the temple of inscriptions is noted for its hieroglyphic tablets.
sentences.cn: 帕伦克墨西哥南部的古代玛雅城市，位于东南。其神庙的铭文以其象形文字的碑文著称。

sentences.en: Ancient Egyptian hieroglyphic script was finally deciphered.
sentences.cn: 古埃及的象形文字终于被破译了.

sentences.en: By translating the Greek passage they could understand what the hieroglyphic passages said.
sentences.cn: 通过翻译那段希腊文,他们能理解象形文字段落所表达的内容.

sentences.en: For centuries hieroglyphic word pictures painted on Egyptian ruins were a mystery.
sentences.cn: 几世纪以来,刻划在埃及废墟中的象形文字一直是个谜.

sentences.en: Or I guess it is a uniform hieroglyphic.
sentences.cn: 或者我猜它是一种统一的象形文字.

sentences.en: The Inca had no system of hieroglyphic writing, as the Maya did, and any portraits that Inca artists may have made of their rulers were lost.
sentences.cn: 和玛雅人一样，印加人也没有象形文字书写系统，而且印加艺术家们所绘制的统治者肖像业已失传。

sentences.en: This symbol later evolved into a common hieroglyphic symbolizing victory.
sentences.cn: 这幕场景后来逐渐演化为象征胜利的普通象形文字.

sentences.en: Thoth is believed to have given the Egyptians the gift of hieroglyphic writing.
sentences.cn: 古埃及人相信,是图特神赐予了他们象形文字书写这一礼物.
